questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar cod again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/HEMOCUE – HB 201+/VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord adapter and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
replace the power cord with a new one
repair or replace the main board accordingly
check and confirm whether the results are out of range
clean the cuvette or place a new cuvette and perform the test. Confirm whether the problem still persist.
check and confirm whether there are any air bubbles in the cuvette
change the cuvette and perform the test
repair or replace the main board
check and confirm whether the low battery symbol appears on display.
change the batteries with a new one
check and confirm whether the error E01 – E05 appears on display.
clean the optronic unit carefully
check and confirm whether the display is blank after switching ON the equipment.
check and confirm whether the batteries are dead
replace the batteries with a new one
repair or replace the display accordingly
IF THE PROBLEM IS NOT YET SOLVED, CONTACT THE TECHNICAL TEAM FOR ANY OTHER ASSISTANCE THROUGH VIDEO CALL.
Thanks
